name: Zattoo
goal:
Zattoo with its main headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland is the largest Internet-TV provider in Europe operating in six counties.
The company has offices in Zurich, Switzerland; Berlin, Germany and Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society
euInitiatives:
- Review of the EU Satellite and Cable Directive
- Digital Single Market
- Copyright and the Single Market
- Net Neutrality
